english.segment1: Can you help me out, can you lend me a hand?. It's safe to say that I'm stuck again. Trapped between this life and the light. I just can't figure out, how to make it right..
english.segment2: A thousand times before. I've wondered if there's something more.. something more..
english.segment3: I feel it's gonna rain like this for days. So let it rain down and wash everything away. I hope that tomorrow the sun will shine. With every tomorrow comes another life..
english.segment4: I feel it's gonna rain, for days and days. (I feel it's gonna rain). I tried to figure out, I can't understand.. What it means.. to be whole again.. Trapped between the truth and the consequence. Nothing's real, nothing's making sense..

english.segment7: Fall down, wash away my yesterdays. Fall down, so let the rain fall down on me..
